options.title: --auto-generate-sql, -a
options.description: Generate SQL statements automatically when they are not supplied in files or using command options

options.title: --auto-generate-sql, -a
options.description: Generate SQL statements automatically when they are not supplied in files or using command options

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-add-autoincrement
options.description: Add AUTO_INCREMENT column to automatically generated tables

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-execute-number=N
options.description: Specify how many queries to generate automatically

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-guid-primary
options.description: Add a GUID-based primary key to automatically generated tables

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-load-type=type
options.description: Specify the test load type

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-secondary-indexes=N
options.description: Specify how many secondary indexes to add to automatically generated tables

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-unique-query-number=N
options.description: How many different queries to generate for automatic tests

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-unique-write-number=N
options.description: How many different queries to generate for --auto-generate-sql-write-number

options.title: --auto-generate-sql-write-number=N
options.description: How many row inserts to perform on each thread

options.title: --commit=N
options.description: How many statements to execute before committing

options.title: --compress, -C
options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.title: --compress, -C
options.description: Compress all information sent between client and server

options.title: --compression-algorithms=value
options.description: Permitted compression algorithms for connections to server

options.title: --concurrency=N, -c N
options.description: Number of clients to simulate when issuing the SELECT statement

options.title: --concurrency=N, -c N
options.description: Number of clients to simulate when issuing the SELECT statement

options.title: --create=value
options.description: File or string containing the statement to use for creating the table

options.title: --create-schema=value
options.description: Schema in which to run the tests

options.title: --csv[=file_name]
options.description: Generate output in comma-separated values format

options.title:
--debug[=debug_options], -#
            [debug_options]

options.description: Print debugging information when program exits

options.description: Print debugging information, memory, and CPU statistics when program exits

options.description: Print debugging information, memory, and CPU statistics when program exits

options.description: Authentication plugin to use

options.description: Read named option file in addition to usual option files

options.title: --defaults-file=file_name
options.description: Read only named option file

options.title: --defaults-group-suffix=str
options.description: Option group suffix value

options.title: --delimiter=str, -F str
options.description: Delimiter to use in SQL statements

options.title: --delimiter=str, -F str
options.description: Delimiter to use in SQL statements

options.title: --detach=N
options.description: Detach (close and reopen) each connection after each N statements

options.title: --enable-cleartext-plugin
options.description: Enable cleartext authentication plugin

options.description: Storage engine to use for creating the table

options.description: Storage engine to use for creating the table

options.description: Request RSA public key from server

options.description: Display help message and exit

options.description: Number of times to run the tests

options.description: Read login path options from .mylogin.cnf

options.title: --no-defaults
options.description: Read no option files

options.title: --no-drop
options.description: Do not drop any schema created during the test run

options.description: Number of VARCHAR columns to use if --auto-generate-sql is specified

options.title: --number-of-queries=N
options.description: Limit each client to approximately this number of queries

options.title: --only-print
options.description: Do not connect to databases. mysqlslap only prints what it would have done
